entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
